column4: I'm getting mixed reports. Some people tell me to use the backports repository to get the Sun Java JDK, and others tell me the warty-backports repos are the devil and I should rather sacrifice my firstborn than add it to sources.list ... anyone here can throw an objective light on the issue?
not me, but what about my ubuntu install? =/
a lot of us split our time with debian and are obsessed with being super bug free...backports are MORE buggy, but they're not going to kill you
